title: Did Donald Trump Supporters Wear KKK Robes to the Nevada Caucus?
subtitle: While photos show two people in Ku Klux Klan robes showing support for Donald Trump at the Nevada caucus, it's unclear if they were actually members of the KKK.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photograph shows two Ku Klux Klan members dressed in white robes showing support for Donald Trump at the Nevada caucus.
